lead_paragraph: Airbnb has teamed up with corporate travel management companies and introduced new rules and services to appeal to business travelers and their bosses.

headline.print_headline: Traveling for Business, and Staying in an Airbnb
headline.main: Airbnb for Business Travelers: More Wi-Fi, Fewer Hosts in Towels

snippet: Airbnb has teamed up with corporate travel management companies and introduced new rules and services to appeal to business travelers and their bosses....
abstract: July report issued by travel and expense management firm Concur indicates business travelers are spending more nights in home-sharing accommodations; Airbnb is cultivating market, forging agreements with America's three big business travel management companies in America and creating subset of business travel-ready listings; hoteliers warn employers who use home-sharing services are forfeiting important liability coverage that their chains offer.
